title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 36 - Appointments By The Court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 36 - Appointments By The Court

State Regulations
§ 36.0 - Preamble
§ 36.1 - Application
§ 36.2 - Appointments
§ 36.3 - Procedure for appointment
§ 36.4 - Procedure after appointment
§ 36.5 - Publication of appointments

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 36

The adoption of new Part 36 and the repeal
of the existing Part 36 shall be effective on June 1, 2003, except that
subdivision (c) of section
36.2
of the new Part 36, entitled
"Disqualifications from appointment," shall be effective on January 1, 2003; the prohibition in paragraphs (4)(i) and (5) of subdivision (c) shall be
effective only as to persons who hold the designated offices after January 1, 2003; and the prohibition in paragraph (4)(i) of subdivision (c) relating to
members, associates, counsel and employees of law firms and entities shall be
effective on June 1, 2003. Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, § 28[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
